.searchboxcancel-icon{position:absolute;right:0px;top:0px;width:60px;height:60px;padding:0;margin:0;border:0;outline:0;font-size:30px;line-height:50px;text-align:center;cursor:pointer;color:#fff;background:#8F308B}#header_searchform{padding:0;margin:0;display:block;top:1px}#header_searchform 767px){#inner_searchform input:not(.btn):not([type="checkbox"]),#inner_searchform select,#inner_searchform textarea{width:81% !important;margin-left:0%}}#inner_searchform           </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-486" id="menu-item-486">
           <a href="http://www.acnt.edu.au/about-acnt/wellbeing-centre">
            Wellbeing Centre
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-446" id="menu-item-446">
           <a href="http://www.acnt.edu.au/blog">
            News
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </li>
        <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children menu-item-105" id="menu-item-105">
         <a href="http://www.acnt.edu.au/apply">
          Apply
         </a>
         <ul class="sub-menu">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-106" id="menu-item-106">

     <div>
      <div id="content">
       <div class="" id="inner-content">
        <main class="main clearfix home-page" id="main" itemprop="mainContentOfPage" role="main">
         <article class="cf post-141 page type-page status-publish hentry" id="post-141">
          <header class="page-header container hidden">
           <h1 class="page-title" itemprop="name">
            Home
           </h1>
          </header>
          <section class="carousel featured no-padding page-section container">
           <div class="featured-carousel ">
            <div class="item ">
             <img alt="" class="attachment-lesa-gallery-thin size-lesa-gallery-thin" height="500" itemprop="image" sizes="(max-width: 1400px) 100vw, 1400px" src="http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place.jpg" srcset="http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place.jpg 1400w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place-300x107.jpg 300w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place-768x274.jpg 768w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place-1024x366.jpg 1024w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place-640x229.jpg 640w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/secure_your_place-1280x457.jpg 1280w" width="1400"/>
             <div class="featured-text-wrapper white align-left featured-with-desc">
              <div class="featured-title">
               <h2 class="h1">
                SECURE YOUR PLACE TODAY
               </h2>
              </div>
              <div class="featured-text">
               ENROL NOW FOR 2018
              </div>
              <div class="featured-cta">
               <div class="btn-wrap">
                <a class="btn btn-primary-alt" href="/courses">
                 Learn more
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="item ">
             <img alt="" class="attachment-lesa-gallery-thin size-lesa-gallery-thin" height="500" itemprop="image" sizes="(max-width: 1400px) 100vw, 1400px" src="http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500.jpg" srcset="http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500.jpg 1400w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500-300x107.jpg 300w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500-768x274.jpg 768w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500-1024x366.jpg 1024w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500-640x229.jpg 640w, http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/sites/8/2016/11/ACNT_Web_Carousel_1400x500-1280x457.jpg 1280w" style="display:none" width="1400"/>
             <div class="featured-text-wrapper white align-left">
              <div class="featured-title">
               <h2 class="h1">
                Upgrade your qualification or career
               </h2>
              </div>
              <div class="featured-cta">
               <div class="btn-wrap">
                <a class="btn btn-primary-alt" href="/blog/news/looking-for-ways-to-upgrade-your-studies-or-career">
                 Read more
                </a>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="container no-space-after search-border">
           <div class="row">
            <form action="http://www.acnt.edu.au/" class="home-course-search" id="home-course-search-form" method="get" role="search">
             <div class="col-lg-offset-2 col-lg-2 col-md-offset-0 col-md-3 col-sm-4 label-wrap">
              <label class="h3 center" for="thome-course-search-area-of-interest">
               Find a Course
              </label>
             </div>
             <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-5 col-sm-4 select-wrap-wrap">

             </div>
             <div class="col-lg-3 col-md-4 col-sm-4 btn-wrap">
              <button class="btn btn-primary" id="home-course-search-area-of-interest_btn" type="submit">
               Search
              </button>
             </div>
            </form>
           </div>
          </section>
          <div id="section-0">
           <section class="container four-panel-feature page-section">
            <div class="row">
             <div class="col-sm-3 col-xs-12">
              <div class="panel panel-default">
               <a class="main-link" href="/studying-with-us/international-students">

                 International
                </h3>
               </a>

                  Read more
                 </a>
                </p>

              </div>
             </div>

              <div class="panel panel-default">

                 Study Online
                </h3>
               </a>
               <div class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">

                 Flexible learning options help you integrate study into day to day life.
                 <br/>
                 <a class="home-four-panel-link" href="/studying-with-us/study-online">
                  Read more
                 </a>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="col-sm-3 col-xs-12">
              <div class="panel panel-default">
               <a class="main-link" href="/apply/course-credits">

                 Course Credits
                </h3>
               </a>
               <div class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">

                 </a>
                </p>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="col-sm-3 col-xs-12">
              <div class="panel panel-default">
               <a class="main-link" href="/about-acnt/events-and-workshops">

                <h3 class="align-center title h4">
                 Events
                </h3>
               </a>
               <div class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">

                 Discover what's coming up on the ACNT calendar.

                </p>

          <section class="container bg-primary">
           <div class="row">

             <h2>
              News
              <div class="slider home-blog-area-carousel">
               <article>

                </div>
                <div class="panel panel-small">
                 <div class="featured-media">

                 </div>
                 <h4>
                  <a href="http://www.acnt.edu.au/blog/news/looking-for-ways-to-upgrade-your-studies-or-career" title="View full article">
                   LOOKING FOR WAYS TO UPGRADE YOUR STUDIES OR CAREER?
                  </a>
                 </h4>

                  </a>

                  </a>
                 </h4>

      <script type="text/javascript">
       // <![CDATA[
 		if (!window._laq) {
 			window._laq = [];
 		}
 		window._laq.push(function() {
 			liveagent.showWhenOnline('5737F000000bw4L', document.getElementById('liveagent_button_online_5737F000000bw4L'));
 			liveagent.showWhenOffline('5737F000000bw4L', document.getElementById('liveagent_button_offline_5737F000000bw4L'));
 		});
 		function jumpToWebForm() {
 			location.href = "/contact-us";
 		}
 		function closeChatWindow() {
 			$("#content").css("margin-bottom", "0px");
 			$("#livechat").css("display", "none");
 		}
 		// ]]>
      </script>

     <script>
      var cb = function() {
         var l = document.createElement('link'); l.rel = 'stylesheet';
         l.href = 'http://www.acnt.edu.au/wp-content/themes/wpms-acnt-child/library/css/style.css';
         var h = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]; h.parentNode.appendChild(l, h);
       l.onload = function(){
         jQuery(document).ready(function() {
           $ = jQuery;
           carousels.init();header.init();        });
       }
     };
     // ---*** Comment this out for now due to a js Race condition *** 07082016 Tien ***-
     // var raf = requestAnimationFrame || mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
     //     webkitRequestAnimationFrame || msRequestAnimationFrame;
     // if (raf) raf(cb);
     // else
     window.addEventListener('load', cb);
     </script>
